page.syntax: color1.Blend as v(color as Alpha5::ColorDefinition[,ratio as n])

argument.name: ratio
argument.description: The ratio of Color to apply to ColorDefinition to modify ColorDefinition.

page.description: Mix two colors together, optional ratio > 0.0, ratio < 1.0 (.5 if not specified).
page.discussion: The .Blend() method modifies Color1 by blending it with Color2 in the proportions specified by Ratio.
page.example:
dim c1 as colordefinition dim c2 as colordefinition c1.Name = "Red" c2.Name = "Blue"
c1.Blend(c2,.5)
? c1 = Blue = 127 Green = 0 HTML_Name = "#7f007f" Hue = 300 Luminance = 24.902 Name = "#127,0,127" Red = 127 RGB_Value = 8323199 Saturation = 100
